awards.title: Helmholtz Prize
awards.subtitle: Precision measurements
description: The Helmholtz Prize is awarded every two years for outstanding scientific and technological work in precision measurements across physics, chemistry, and medicine.

The dual-comb hyperspectral digital holography technique I developed represents a breakthrough in scan-free wavefront reconstruction and three-dimensional metrology, highlighting the transformative potential of frequency-comb spectroscopy in advanced imaging.

awards.title: Bernard J. Couillaud Prize in Ultrafast Lasers
awards.subtitle: Optica Foundation and Coherent, Inc.
description: Awarded by the Optica Foundation and Coherent, Inc., this prestigious prize recognizes early-stage professionals for exceptional contributions to ultrafast laser technology.
The award acknowledges my work on ultrafast spectroscopy methods for precision measurement and imaging.
